thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceeded Expectations!
thread.title_full: Exceeded Expectations! - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JHinAZ
title: Exceeded Expectations!
text: During a business trip that spanned a weekend, I decided to travel to NYC to see the 9/11 Museum. Traveling by myself & for such a short time I wanted a hotel that was in the immediate vicinity of the museum. I could not have gotten any closer without camping out at the Memorial! This hotel is located literally next door to the memorial & museum and is in easy walking distance to many restaurants, stores & historic sights. The next surprise for me was that the weekend room rate was so reasonable. I was not expecting to stay in Manhattan for such a reasonable rate - and imagine my surprise when I got to the hotel & saw how NICE it is! Very small room which I would have expected but very well laid out and nicely decorated. Great amenities and I was surprised to find that I even had a good view of the Empire State Building. Staff could not have been more friendly & helpful. They arranged car service for me before I arrived so I had a ride waiting to pick me up at Penn Station. The day I was to leave, they arranged for another Club Quarters to hold my luggage for me so I could sightsee in Midtown without having to come back down to get my bag. So accommodating & I was very comfortable as a single female traveler in this facility. This is now "my" hotel in NYC!
